review: 연대앞에 있어서 1년내내 번화가인 곳이에요. 옛날에 비해서 체인점들이 많아서 특색은 좀 없어졌지만 특히 밤에 더 분위기가 활기차요

This road, which passes only public transportation after road maintenance, has a pleasant pedestrian environment, and on weekends, traffic is completely controlled, making it a square.

It is one of the most beautiful campuses in Seoul.
